title: 104_hr3115
content: Alcohol Ingredient Labeling Act of 1996 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to deem a malt beverage, wine, or distilled spirit mislabeled unless it bears a label disclosing: (1) the alcoholic content, (2) the number of drinks, (3) its ingredients and calories, (4) the common name of each ingredient, including additives. And (5) a toll-free number for help with a drinking problem. Authorizes appropriations for the toll-free number.
